title: Client Lagging alot that I keep dodging.
body: i was having problems with my fps so i reinstalled league of legends on my macbook pro and it got way laggier than before. especially it lags alot when i go in champ select that i cant even claim a champion. can you fix this please.

replies.body:
How old is your macbook? Not the best gaming system even if it is newer.
Try enabling low spec mode if you have not. It makes the pre game client much smoother but does not affect the game.

If you're having lag or syncing issues in champion select, then the culprit might actually be your connection and not game files.  Your best bet is to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network to champion select, which should also help any potential instability once you get in game.  I hope that helps!
